definition: addicted to/fond of/stem corresponding to -phil or -phile

sentences.english: I would have you consider your judgment and your appetite even as you would two loved guests in your house.
sentences.chinese: 我願你們把判斷和嗜慾當作你們家中的兩位佳客。

sentences.english: Intelligent people are good at using reason to control excessive addictions.
sentences.chinese: 智慧的人善於用理性來控制過度的嗜慾。
